ResearchProjectDef.label: firefoam
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the construction of firefoam poppers; fire-safety buildings which spread fire-retardant foam in response to encroaching flames.

ResearchProjectDef.label: moisture pump
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the construction of moisture pumps, which turn wet ground dry.

ResearchProjectDef.label: geothermal power
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to build geothermal power plants on top of steam geysers, for uninterrupted power.

ResearchProjectDef.label: hospital bed
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows colonists to construct hospital beds which increase chance of successful medical work.

ResearchProjectDef.label: multi-analyzer
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows colonists to build multi-analyzers which increase research speed, and allow higher-level research projects, if placed near a research bench.
